item.title: Add DynaPictures - added free plan limits
item.description: https://dynapictures.com - Design automation tool which lets you dynamically generate images over REST API. Change colors, texts, logos and images on the fly. Free plan includes 30 generated images per month and 3 image templates.

item.title: Add integromat
item.description: https://www.integromat.com - Workflow automation tool which lets you connect apps and automate workflows using UI, it supports many apps and most popular APIs. Free for public GitHub repositories, and free tier with 100 Mb, 1000 Operations and 15 minutes of minimum interval.

item.title: Add framer.com
item.description: https://www.framer.com/ - Framer helps you iterate and animate interface ideas for your next app, website, or productâ€”starting with powerful layouts. For anyone validating Framer as a professional prototyping tool: unlimited viewers, up to 2 editors, up to 3 projects.

item.title: Add Economize.cloud
item.description: https://economize.cloud - Economize helps demystify cloud infrastructure costs by organizing cloud resources, optimize and report the same. Free for up to $5000 spends on Google Cloud Platform every month.
